title: NFL Monday Night Football average viewers 2015 to 2019
summary: An average of 15.4 million viewers tuned in to watch thursday night football in the country during the 2019 nfl season , an increase of half a million on the previous year . Ratings for Monday night football also increased in 2019 , with the average number of viewers rising to 12.6 million . Prime-time packages receive ratings boost thursday night football is part of the prime-time television schedule that also includes Monday night football and Sunday night football – these nfl games are broadcast across the entire country by one major national network .
